description: a(0) = 1, a(n) = product{k = 0 to n-1}[ a(k)+a(n-k) ].
formula: lim_{m -> oo} log(a[m+1])/log(a[m]) exists and equals 3. - _Roland Bacher_, Sep 06 2004.
crossrefs: Cf. A000108 (Catalan numbers) where a(0) = 1, a(n) = sum{k = 0 to n-1}[ a(k)*a(n-k) ], A000012 (constant 1) where a(0) = 1, a(n) = product{k = 0 to n-1}[ a(k)*a(n-k) ] and A025192 (2*3^(n-1)) where a(0) = 1, a(n) = sum{k = 0 to n-1}[ a(k)+a(n-k) ] - _Henry Bottomley_, May 16 2000
author: _Leroy Quet_
